text: Hargiz gustho va xunhoi qurʙonijon ʙa Alloh namerasad, cunki Alloh ʙenijoz va loiqi sitois ast, ʙalki parhezgorii sumo, (ja'ne ixlosu nijati sumo) ʙa U merasad. Hamcunin onhoro ʙarojaton musaxxar namud, to Allohro ʙa xotiri on, ki hidojataton kardaast, ʙa ʙuzurgi jod kuned. Va nekukoronro muƶda ʙideh
